nodes.id: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

location.zh-cn: 北京市西城区广安门南街70号
location.en: No. 70, Guang'anmen South Street, Xicheng District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管安全生产、灾害管理和应急救援的组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for safety production, disaster management, and emergency rescue.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国应急管理部部长、党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Minister and Party Secretary of the Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 2018年由第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过的机构改革方案，其中包括组建应急管理部。
description.en: The institutional reform plan passed by the first session of the 13th National People's Congress in 2018, which included the establishment of the Ministry of Emergency Management.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十三届全国人民代表大会的第一次全体会议，于2018年3月在北京举行，会议通过了《国务院机构改革方案》。
description.en: The first plenary session of the 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, held in Beijing in March 2018, which approved the 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan'.

nodes.id: 国家安全生产监督管理总局

zh-cn: 国家安全生产监督管理总局

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国国务院直属机构，负责全国安全生产工作。其职责后被整合进应急管理部。
description.en: A former agency directly under the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national work safety. Its responsibilities were later integrated into the Ministry of Emergency Management.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国应急管理部管理的国家局，由原国家煤矿安全监察局更名而来。
description.en: A national bureau administered by the Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China, renamed from the former State Administration of Coal Mine Safety.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国应急管理部管理的国家局，负责国家综合性消防救援队伍建设和管理。
description.en: A national bureau administered by the Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China, responsible for the construction and management of the national comprehensive fire and rescue team.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国应急管理部管理的事业单位，主管全国地震工作。
description.en: A public institution administered by the Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China, in charge of national earthquake affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国应急管理部首任部长。
description.en: Chinese politician, served as the first Minister of the Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国应急管理部部长、党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Minister and Party Secretary of the Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中央纪委国家监委驻应急管理部纪检监察组组长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group of the CCDI and NSC stationed at the Ministry of Emergency Management.

nodes.id: 中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会驻应急管理部纪检监察组

zh-cn: 中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会驻应急管理部纪检监察组
中央纪委国家监委驻应急部纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会、中华人民共和国国家监察委员会设在应急管理部的派驻机构。
description.en: The dispatched agency of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CCP and the National Supervisory Commission of the PRC stationed at the Ministry of Emergency Management.

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国应急管理部管理的国家局，后更名为国家矿山安全监察局。
description.en: A former national bureau administered by the Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China, later renamed the National Mine Safety Administration.

description.zh-cn: 中国官员，现任国家矿山安全监察局局长，应急管理部党委委员。
description.en: Chinese official, current Director of the National Mine Safety Administration and a member of the Party Committee of the Ministry of Emergency Management.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国应急管理部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国应急管理部是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门。
description.en: The Ministry of Emergency Management is a constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

description.zh-cn: 根据2018年《国务院机构改革方案》，整合多个部门的相关职责，组建了应急管理部。
description.en: According to the 2018 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan', the Ministry of Emergency Management was established by integrating the relevant responsibilities of multiple departments.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过了《关于国务院机构改革方案的决定》，批准了该方案。
description.en: The first session of the 13th National People's Congress passed the 'Decision on the State Council Institutional Reform Plan', approving the plan.

relationships.target: 国家安全生产监督管理总局

description.zh-cn: 根据2018年《国务院机构改革方案》，国家安全生产监督管理总局的职责被整合进应急管理部，该机构不再保留。
description.en: According to the 2018 'State Council Institutional Reform Plan', the responsibilities of the State Administration of Work Safety were integrated into the Ministry of Emergency Management, and the agency was no longer retained.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

description.zh-cn: 国家矿山安全监察局由应急管理部管理。
description.en: The National Mine Safety Administration is administered by the Ministry of Emergency Management.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

description.zh-cn: 国家消防救援局由应急管理部管理。
description.en: The National Fire and Rescue Administration is administered by the Ministry of Emergency Management.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

description.zh-cn: 中国地震局由应急管理部管理。
description.en: The China Earthquake Administration is administered by the Ministry of Emergency Management.

description.zh-cn: 国家煤矿安全监察局于2020年更名为国家矿山安全监察局。
description.en: The State Administration of Coal Mine Safety was renamed the National Mine Safety Administration in 2020.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

description.zh-cn: 王祥喜于2022年7月起任应急管理部党委书记，2022年9月起任部长。
description.en: Wang Xiangxi has served as Party Secretary of the Ministry of Emergency Management since July 2022, and as Minister since September 2022.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

description.zh-cn: 王玉普是中华人民共和国应急管理部首任部长。
description.en: Wang Yupu was the first Minister of the Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

description.en: Huang Ming served as Vice Minister (2018-2021), Minister (2021-2022), and Party Secretary (2020-2022) of the Ministry of Emergency Management.

relationships.target: 中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会驻应急管理部纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 蒲宇飞自2019年12月起担任中央纪委国家监委驻应急管理部纪检监察组组长。
description.en: Pu Yufei has served as the head of the Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group stationed at the Ministry of Emergency Management since December 2019.

description.zh-cn: 黄锦生自2023年5月起担任国家矿山安全监察局局长、党组书记。
description.en: Huang Jinsheng has served as the Director and Party Group Secretary of the National Mine Safety Administration since May 2023.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

description.zh-cn: 黄锦生自2023年5月起担任应急管理部党委委员。
description.en: Huang Jinsheng has served as a member of the Party Committee of the Ministry of Emergency Management since May 2023.
